    • Method Detail

      • arc

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage arc(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                               double angle,
                               double spreadAngle,
                               double radius,
                               double height,
                               double centreX,
                               double centerY)
        A filter which wraps an image around a circular arc.
        Parameters:
        image -
        angle - the angle of the arc. default 0
        spreadAngle - the spread angle of the arc. default 3.14
        radius - the radius of the effect. default 10
        height - the height of the arc. default 20
        centreX - centre of the effect in the X direction as a proportion of the image size. default 0.5 (middle)
        centerY - centre of the effect in the Y direction as a proportion of the image siz. default 0.5 (middle)

      • blurGaussian

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage blurGaussian(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                        int radius,
                                        int iterations)
        A filter which performs a box blur on an image. The horizontal and vertical blurs can be specified separately and a number of iterations can be given which allows an approximation to Gaussian blur.
        Parameters:
        image - image to filter
        hRadius - the radius of blur
        iterations - the number of time to iterate the blur

      • blurGaussian

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage blurGaussian(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                        int hRadius,
                                        int vRadius,
                                        int iterations)
        A filter which performs a box blur on an image. The horizontal and vertical blurs can be specified separately and a number of iterations can be given which allows an approximation to Gaussian blur.
        Parameters:
        image - image to filter
        hRadius - the horizontal radius of blur
        vRadius - the vertical radius of blur
        iterations - the number of time to iterate the blur

      • blurSimple

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage blurSimple(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        A filter which averages the 3x3 neighbourhood of each pixel, providing a simple blur.
        Parameters:
        image - image to filter

        A filter which performs a box blur with a different blur radius at each pixel.
        Parameters:
        image -
        radius - the size of the blur.
        iterations - the number of iterations the blur is performed

      • composite

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage composite(java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageMain,
                                     java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageToAdd,
                                     int x,
                                     int y)
        Draws imageToAdd on top of imageMain. To be used when creating a larger image and filtering together
        Parameters:
        imageMain - the image to alter
        imageToAdd - the image being added
        x - x-coord relative to imageMain
        y - y-coord relative to imageMain

      • glowInner

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage glowInner(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                     double amount)
        A filter which adds Gaussian blur to an image, producing a glowing effect.
        Parameters:
        image -
        amount - the amount of glow. negatives result in darkening(inner shadow?)
        Returns:

      • kaleidoscope

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage kaleidoscope(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                        int sides,
                                        double radius,
                                        double angle,
                                        double angle2,
                                        double centreX,
                                        double centreY)
        A Filter which produces the effect of looking into a kaleidoscope(Great for images/text with alpha).
        Parameters:
        image -
        sides - the number of sides of the kaleidoscope. default 3
        radius - the radius of the effect. default 0
        angle - angle of the kaleidoscope. default 0
        angle2 - secondary angle of the kaleidoscope. default 0
        centreX - centre of the effect in the X direction as a proportion of the image size. default 0.5 (middle)
        centreY - centre of the effect in the Y direction as a proportion of the image size. default 0.5 (middle)
        Returns:

      • opacity

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage opacity(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                   double opacity)
        A filter thats sets the opacity(transparency) of an image
        Parameters:
        image -
        opacity - 0-100% 100 being opaque

      • perspective

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage perspective(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                       float x0,
                                       float y0,
                                       float x1,
                                       float y1,
                                       float x2,
                                       float y2,
                                       float x3,
                                       float y3)
        A filter which performs a perspective distortion on an image. Coordinates are treated as if the image was a unit square, i.e. the bottom-right corner of the image is at (1, 1). The filter maps the unit square onto an arbitrary convex quadrilateral or vice versa.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to alter
        x0 - the new position of the top left corner
        y0 - the new position of the top left corner
        x1 - the new position of the top right corner
        y1 - the new position of the top right corner
        x2 - the new position of the bottom right corner
        y2 - the new position of the bottom right corner
        x3 - the new position of the bottom left corner
        y3 - the new position of the bottom left corner

      • rescale

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage rescale(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                   double scale)
        Rescales the image based on mulitplicity. E.g. 0.5 = half size while 2 = double size
        Parameters:
        image -
        scale -
        Returns:

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage rotate(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,

                                  java.lang.String anchor)

        Parameters:
        image -
        angle - degrees to rotate
        anchor - center, left, right, top, bottom, topleft, topright, bottomleft, bottomright

        Parameters:
        image -
        amount - effect in percentage 1-100+
